channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report E-2023120327
item.description:
Report E-2023120327

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-06
  • City: TULSA
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2023120710
item.description:
Report X-2023120710

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-19T18:11:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found at the back of belt 7 at NOKC 732 leaking from a tub of In the Swim pool shock that was cracked. Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag. DescribePack: Box appeared to be undamaged, but the tub was cracked on bottom. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag.
